author: andschwa
body: We can diff now. But it is concerning that these might be re-imported.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Some of these are in mapping files, so we need to be very aware of file encodings when re-imported.

comments.author: JamesWTruher
comments.body: also, eventually we'll be supporting multiple cultures where UTF8 is not going to be sufficient, we need to be a bit flexible here. Is there any chance that git will be able to deal with this over time?

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
> supporting multiple cultures where UTF8 is not going to be sufficient

UTF8 will allows us to support multiple cultures. It can represent any Unicode character.
